description.en:
The Global Research Identifiers Database previously assigned unique identifiers to research institutions. It has been deprecated in favour of https://org-id.guide/list/XI-ROR and should no longer be used.

It recorded information on the nature of the research organisation, covering companies, education establishments, healthcare, non-profits, government and other entity types. 

GRID also recorded parent-child relationships between entities, related relationships and cross-linkages to a range of other identifier sources.

access.onlineAccessDetails: Previous releases of the GRID database are available to download up until September 2021.
